meanings.definition: An article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale.
meanings.sent1: The local bakery sells a delicious product called bread.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new cleaning product to use in my kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to be a product of endless surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a product of her vivid imagination.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece was a stunning product of her talent.

meanings.definition: The result or outcome of a process or action.
meanings.sent1: The successful launch of the new product brought in many customers.
meanings.sent2: The final product of the experiment was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The product of their teamwork was a beautifully decorated room.
meanings.sent4: His hard work was the product of his determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The product of their collaboration was a groundbreaking invention.

meanings.definition: A quantity obtained by multiplying quantities together.
meanings.sent2: Math class focused on calculating products of different numbers.
meanings.sent3: The product of their ages was the total number of years they had lived.
meanings.sent4: The product of the two measurements determined the final area of the room.
meanings.sent5: The product of their efforts resulted in a successful outcome.
